name: Class 5 Warmup
description:
Here are three levels to play in class, made using the bones of the game we are making!

CONTROLS: ARROW KEYS TO MOVE, SPACE TO JUMP. REFRESH THE PAGE TO RESTART. :)

As you play, please think about three things from the perspective of a new player.

1: Something you like about how these levels are designed or something that makes it fun.

2: Something that you don't like or something that makes you have less fun.

3: How the game design implies what the player needs to get to and avoid without explicitly telling them. For example, how did you figure out where you needed to go? How did you figure out what is an obstacle?

After you play, share your answers to these questions with the person next to you. Discuss what you would change about these levels and what you would add to make them more enjoyable.
